Parameters: String: The error message for the exception.
FactoryConfigurationError(java.lang.Stri.Description: Create a new FactoryConfigurationError with the String specified as an error message.

Parameters: Exception: The exception to be encapsulated in a FactoryConfigurationError
FactoryConfigurationError(java.lang.Exce.Description: Create a new FactoryConfigurationError with the given Exception base cause and detail message.

Parameters: Exception: The exception to be encapsulated in a FactoryConfigurationError.
FactoryConfigurationError(java.lang.Exce.Description: Create a new FactoryConfigurationError with a given Exception base cause of the error.

Returns: The encapsulated exception, or null if there is none.
getException().Description: Return the actual exception (if any) that caused this exception to be raised.

getMessage().Description: Return the message (if any) for this error . If there is no message for the exception and there is an encapsulated exception then the message of that exception, if it exists will be returned. Else the name of the encapsulated exception will be returned.

FactoryConfigurationError().Description: Create a new FactoryConfigurationError with no detail message.

ClassDesc: Thrown when a problem with configuration with the Parser Factories exists. This error will typically be thrown when the class of a parser factory specified in the system properties cannot be found or instantiated.
